name: Reinforce
description: Reduces damage taken from an incoming attack by 50%. Charges are removed when attacked.

name: Riposte
description: Negates the damage taken from an incoming attack and counterattacks for #power# damage. Charges are removed when attacked.

name: Phalanx
description: Transfers 25% of the damage from the next attack received to Beorn.

name: Purity
description: Increases max HP by #power# per stack.

name: Righteousness
description: Incoming attacks will be focused on this unit.

name: Corruption
description: Increases Power by 10% per stack and reduces max HP by 10% per stack.

name: Tired
description: Reduces damage done by Overexertion by 30% per stack.

name: Rested
description: Increases Power by #power#.  Charges are removed when attacked.

name: Scorched
description: Takes #power# damage on its turn.

name: Chaos
description: When stacked to three, Zoe will deal additional damage with Apocalypse.

name: Chilled
description: Feeling a bit cold.

name: Ice Box
description: Immune to damage.

name: Necrosis
description: This unit takes #power# damage per stack at the start of its turn.

name: Regen
description: Heal for #power# HP at the start of its turn and remove a stack.

name: Paeon
description: Increases max HP by #power#.

name: Madrigal
description: Increases Power by #power#.

name: Requiem
description: Takes double damage on next attack.  Charges are removed when attacked.

name: Mark
description: Heroes will focus their attacks this unit.

name: Wilt
description: Reduces healing received by 50%.

name: Translucent
description: Negates the damage taken from the next incoming attack.

name: Phased
description: Negates all damage taken from incoming attacks until Stinkie's next turn.

name: Evasion
description: Negates the damage taken from the next incoming attack.

name: Jarls Blessing
description: Increases Power by #power#.

name: Carapace
description: Reduces damage taken from an incoming attack by 25%.  Charges are removed when attacked.

name: Cactus Time
description: Enemies take #power# damage when attacking this cactus.

name: Bone Up
description: Negates damage taken from incoming attacks and is immune to Debuffs.

name: Mighty
description: Takes double damage from Might heroes.

name: Mindful
description: Takes double damage from Mind heroes.

name: Moxious
description: Takes double damage from Moxie heroes.

name: Mighty Mail
description: Reduces damage taken from incoming attacks by 10% per stack.

name: Mindful Meditation
description: Increases healing received by 10% per stack.

name: Moxious Maneuver
description: Increases damage taken by 20% per stack.

name: Phoenix Fire
description: Takes #power# damage when attacking.

name: Hardened
description: Reduces damage taken from incoming attacks by 75%.

name: Weakened
description: Reduces max HP by 10% per stack.

name: This is Bananas
description: B a NaN as!

name: Chop Chop
description: Reduces damage taken to 1.

name: Monkey Hungry
description: Remaining times to go looking for food.

name: Time For Lunch
description: Searching for bananas.  Will come out of hiding when reduced to 0 HP.

name: Mind Control
description: Krakoptopus has control of this hero's next special skill, using it against your team or for his benefit.

name: Cold Blooded
description: Negates damage received on the next incoming attack, and heals for 200% of the damage that would have been taken.

name: Kingpin
description: Empowers Goblin King's attacks.

name: Take My Shield!
description: Reduces damage taken from every third attack by 100%.  Deals double damage to Might heroes.

name: Take My Staff!
description: Heals the Goblin King for 10% of his max HP on his turn.  Deals double damage to Mind heroes.

name: Take My Knife!
description: The Goblin King's regular attacks now target the lowest HP enemy.   Deals double damage to Moxie heroes.

name: Provoke The Mighty
description: Taunts all attacks by Might heroes and can't be targeted by Non-Might heroes until Goblin King is dead

name: Provoke The Mind
description: Taunts all attacks by Mind heroes and can't be targeted by Non-Mind heroes until Goblin King is dead

name: Provoke The Moxie
description: Taunts all attacks by Moxie heroes and can't be targeted by Non-Moxie heroes until Goblin King is dead

name: Weaken Foes
description: Increases damage taken by 1.5x for the next attack received.

name: Watchful Eye
description: Once Beclutcher reaches 7 stacks of Watchful Eye, Beclutcher will instantly kill their target.

name: Hindsight
description: Playbook turn order is going in reverse.
